00057 const uint32_t Master::DEFAULT_LEASE_INTERVAL;

00066 Master::Master(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, PropertiesPtr &props,
00067                ServerKeepaliveHandlerPtr &keepalive_handler)
00068     : m_verbose(false), m_next_handle_number(1), m_next_session_id(1) {
00069   const char *dirname;
00070   std::string str;
00071   uint16_t port;
00072 
00073   m_verbose = props->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose", false);
00074 
00075   m_lease_interval = props->get_int("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval",
00076                                     DEFAULT_LEASE_INTERVAL);
00077 
00078   m_keep_alive_interval = props->get_int("Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval",
00079                                          DEFAULT_KEEPALIVE_INTERVAL);
00080 
00081   if ((dirname = props->get("Hyperspace.Master.Dir", 0)) == 0) {
00082     HT_ERROR("Property 'Hyperspace.Master.Dir' not found.");
00083     exit(1);
00084   }
00085 
00086   if (dirname[strlen(dirname)-1] == '/')
00087     str = std::string(dirname, strlen(dirname)-1);
00088   else
00089     str = dirname;
00090 
00091   if (dirname[0] == '/')
00092     m_base_dir = str;
00093   else
00094     m_base_dir = System::install_dir + "/" + str;
00095 
00096   if ((m_base_fd = ::open(m_base_dir.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00097     HT_WARNF("Unable to open base directory '%s' - will create.",
00098              m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00099     if (!FileUtils::mkdirs(m_base_dir.c_str())) {
00100       HT_ERRORF("Unable to create base directory %s - %s",
00101                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00102       exit(1);
00103     }
00104     if ((m_base_fd = ::open(m_base_dir.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00105       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open base directory %s - %s",
00106                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00107       exit(1);
00108     }
00109   }
00110 
00114   if (flock(m_base_fd, LOCK_EX | LOCK_NB) != 0) {
00115     if (errno == EWOULDBLOCK) {
00116       HT_ERRORF("Base directory '%s' is locked by another process.",
00117                 m_base_dir.c_str());
00118     }
00119     else {
00120       HT_ERRORF("Unable to lock base directory '%s' - %s",
00121                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00122     }
00123     exit(1);
00124   }
00125 
00126   m_bdb_fs = new BerkeleyDbFilesystem(m_base_dir);
00127 
00131   get_generation_number();
00132 
00133   NodeDataPtr root_node = new NodeData();
00134   root_node->name = "/";
00135   m_node_map["/"] = root_node;
00136 
00137   port = props->get_int("Hyperspace.Master.Port", DEFAULT_MASTER_PORT);
00138   InetAddr::initialize(&m_local_addr, INADDR_ANY, port);
00139 
00140   m_keepalive_handler_ptr.reset(
00141       new ServerKeepaliveHandler(conn_mgr->get_comm(), this));
00142   keepalive_handler = m_keepalive_handler_ptr;
00143 
00144   if (m_verbose) {
00145     cout << "Hyperspace.Lease.Interval=" << m_lease_interval << endl;
00146     cout << "Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval=" << m_keep_alive_interval << endl;
00147     cout << "Hyperspace.Master.Dir=" << m_base_dir << endl;
00148     cout << "Generation=" << m_generation << endl;
00149   }
00150 }

00157   ::close(m_base_fd);

00163 uint64_t Master::create_session(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00164   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00165   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00166   uint64_t session_id = m_next_session_id++;
00167   session_data = new SessionData(addr, m_lease_interval, session_id);
00168   m_session_map[session_id] = session_data;
00169   m_session_heap.push_back(session_data);
00170   return session_id;
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 bool Master::get_session(uint64_t session_id, SessionDataPtr &session_data) {
00175   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00176   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00177   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00178     return false;
00179   session_data = (*iter).second;
00180   return true;
00181 }
00182 
00183 void Master::destroy_session(uint64_t session_id) {
00184   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00185   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00186   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00187   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00188     return;
00189   session_data = (*iter).second;
00190   m_session_map.erase(session_id);
00191   session_data->expire();
00192   // force it to top of expiration heap
00193   boost::xtime_get(&session_data->expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00194 }
00195 
00196 
00197 int Master::renew_session_lease(uint64_t session_id) {
00198   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00199 
00200   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00201   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00202     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00203 
00204   if (!(*iter).second->renew_lease())
00205     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00206 
00207   return Error::OK;
00208 }
00209 
00210 bool Master::next_expired_session(SessionDataPtr &session_data) {
00211   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00212   struct LtSessionData ascending;
00213   boost::xtime now;
00214 
00215   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00216 
00217   if (m_session_heap.size() > 0) {
00218     std::make_heap(m_session_heap.begin(), m_session_heap.end(), ascending);
00219     if (m_session_heap[0]->is_expired(now)) {
00220       session_data = m_session_heap[0];
00221       std::pop_heap(m_session_heap.begin(), m_session_heap.end(), ascending);
00222       m_session_heap.resize(m_session_heap.size()-1);
00223       m_session_map.erase(session_data->id);
00224       return true;
00225     }
00226   }
00227   return false;
00228 }

00230 
00234 void Master::remove_expired_sessions() {
00235   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00236   int error;
00237   std::string errmsg;
00238 
00239   while (next_expired_session(session_data)) {
00240 
00241     if (m_verbose) {
00242       HT_INFOF("Expiring session %lld", session_data->id);
00243     }
00244 
00245     session_data->expire();
00246 
00247     {
00248       boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(session_data->mutex);
00249       HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00250       foreach(uint64_t handle, session_data->handles) {
00251         if (m_verbose) {
00252           HT_INFOF("Destroying handle %llu", (Llu)handle);
00253         }
00254         if (!destroy_handle(handle, &error, errmsg, false)) {
00255           HT_ERRORF("Problem destroying handle - %s (%s)",
00256                     Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00257         }
00258       }
00259       session_data->handles.clear();
00260     }
00261   }
00262 
00263 }

00269 void Master::create_handle(uint64_t *handlep, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00270   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00271   *handlep = ++m_next_handle_number;
00272   handle_data = new HandleData();
00273   handle_data->id = *handlep;
00274   handle_data->locked = false;
00275   m_handle_map[*handlep] = handle_data;
00276 }
00277 
00281 bool Master::get_handle_data(uint64_t handle, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00282   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00283   HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00284   if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00285     return false;
00286   handle_data = (*iter).second;
00287   return true;
00288 }
00289 
00293 bool Master::remove_handle_data(uint64_t handle, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00294   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00295   HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00296   if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00297     return false;
00298   handle_data = (*iter).second;
00299   m_handle_map.erase(iter);
00300   return true;
00301 }

00309 void
00310 Master::mkdir(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name) {
00311   std::string abs_name;
00312   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00313   std::string child_name;
00314 
00315   if (m_verbose) {
00316     HT_INFOF("mkdir(session_id=%lld, name=%s)", session_id, name);
00317   }
00318 
00319   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name)) {
00320     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "directory '/' exists");
00321     return;
00322   }
00323 
00324   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00325 
00326   DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
00327 
00328   try {
00329     boost::mutex::scoped_lock node_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00330 
00331     m_bdb_fs->mkdir(txn, name);
00332 
00333     txn->commit(0);
00334 
00335     // deliver event notifications
00336     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED,
00337                                             child_name));
00338     deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event);
00339   }
00340   catch (Exception &e) {
00341     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00342     txn->abort();
00343     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00344     return;
00345   }
00346 
00347   cb->response_ok();
00348 }

00355 void
00356 Master::unlink(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name) {
00357   std::string child_name;
00358   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00359 
00360   if (m_verbose) {
00361     HT_INFOF("unlink(session_id=%lld, name=%s)", session_id, name);
00362   }
00363 
00364   if (!strcmp(name, "/")) {
00365     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_PERMISSION_DENIED,
00366               "Cannot remove '/' directory");
00367     return;
00368   }
00369 
00370   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name)) {
00371     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00372     return;
00373   }
00374 
00375   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00376 
00377   DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
00378 
00379   try {
00380     boost::mutex::scoped_lock node_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00381 
00382     m_bdb_fs->unlink(txn, name);
00383 
00384     txn->commit(0);
00385 
00386     // deliver event notifications
00387     HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED,
00388                                                 child_name));
00389     deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event_ptr);
00390   }
00391   catch (Exception &e) {
00392     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00393     txn->abort();
00394     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00395     return;
00396   }
00397 
00398   cb->response_ok();
00399 }

00402 
00406 void
00407 Master::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name,
00408     uint32_t flags, uint32_t event_mask, std::vector<Attribute> &init_attrs) {
00409   std::string child_name;
00410   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00411   NodeDataPtr node_data;
00412   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00413   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00414   bool created = false;
00415   bool is_dir = false;
00416   bool existed;
00417   uint64_t handle;
00418   bool lock_notifiy = false;
00419   uint32_t lock_mode = 0;
00420   uint64_t lock_generation = 0;
00421 
00422   if (m_verbose) {
00423     HT_INFOF("open(session_id=%lld, fname=%s, flags=0x%x, event_mask=0x%x)",
00424              session_id, name, flags, event_mask);
00425   }
00426 
00427   assert(name[0] == '/');
00428 
00429   DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
00430 
00431   try {
00432     if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00433       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00434 
00435     if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name))
00436       HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00437 
00438     if (!init_attrs.empty() && !(flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE))
00439       HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_CREATE_FAILED,
00440                "initial attributes can only be supplied on CREATE");
00441 
00442     // If path name to open is "/", then create a dummy NodeData object for
00443     // the parent because the previous call will return the node itself as
00444     // the parent, causing the second of the following two mutex locks to hang
00445     if (!strcmp(name, "/"))
00446       parent_node = new NodeData();
00447 
00448     get_node(name, node_data);
00449 
00450     {
00451       boost::mutex::scoped_lock parent_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00452       boost::mutex::scoped_lock node_lock(node_data->mutex);
00453 
00454       if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) {
00455         if (node_data->exclusive_lock_handle != 0)
00456           HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_LOCK_CONFLICT, "");
00457         lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00458         if (node_data->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00459           lock_notifiy = true;
00460       }
00461       else if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) {
00462         if (node_data->exclusive_lock_handle != 0 ||
00463             !node_data->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00464           HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_LOCK_CONFLICT, "");
00465         lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00466         lock_notifiy = true;
00467       }
00468 
00469       existed = m_bdb_fs->exists(txn, name, &is_dir);
00470 
00471       if (existed) {
00472         if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE) && (flags & OPEN_FLAG_EXCL))
00473           HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "mode=CREATE|EXCL");
00474 
00475         if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP))
00476           HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "Unable to open TEMP file "
00477                     "'%s' because it already exists", name);
00478         // Read/create 'lock.generation' attribute
00479         if (node_data->lock_generation == 0) {
00480           if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00481                                        &node_data->lock_generation)) {
00482             node_data->lock_generation = 1;
00483             m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00484                                     node_data->lock_generation);
00485           }
00486         }
00487       }
00488       else {
00489         if (!(flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE))
00490           HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00491 
00492         m_bdb_fs->create(txn, name, (flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP));
00493         node_data->lock_generation = 1;
00494         m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00495                                 node_data->lock_generation);
00496         // Set the initial attributes
00497         for (size_t i=0; i<init_attrs.size(); i++)
00498           m_bdb_fs->set_xattr(txn, name, init_attrs[i].name,
00499                               init_attrs[i].value, init_attrs[i].value_len);
00500         if (flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP)
00501           node_data->ephemeral = true;
00502         created = true;
00503       }
00504 
00505       create_handle(&handle, handle_data);
00506 
00507       handle_data->node = node_data.get();
00508       handle_data->open_flags = flags;
00509       handle_data->event_mask = event_mask;
00510       handle_data->session_data = session_data;
00511 
00512       session_data->add_handle(handle);
00513 
00514       if (created) {
00515         HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED,
00516                                                 child_name));
00517         deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event);
00518       }
00519 
00523       if (lock_mode != 0) {
00524         handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00525         m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00526                                 handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00527         lock_generation = handle_data->node->lock_generation;
00528         handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = lock_mode;
00529 
00530         lock_handle(handle_data, lock_mode);
00531 
00532         // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00533         if (lock_notifiy) {
00534           HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockAcquired(lock_mode));
00535           deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00536         }
00537       }
00538 
00539       handle_data->node->add_handle(handle, handle_data);
00540 
00541       txn->commit(0);
00542     }
00543   }
00544   catch (Exception &e) {
00545     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00546     txn->abort();
00547     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00548     return;
00549   }
00550 
00551   cb->response(handle, created, lock_generation);
00552 }
00553 
00554 
00558 void Master::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle) {
00559   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00560   int error;
00561   std::string errmsg;
00562   size_t n;
00563 
00564   if (m_verbose) {
00565     HT_INFOF("close(session=%lld, handle=%lld)", session_id, handle);
00566   }
00567 
00568   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00569     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00570     return;
00571   }
00572 
00573   {
00574     boost::mutex::scoped_lock slock(session_data->mutex);
00575     n = session_data->handles.erase(handle);
00576   }
00577 
00578   if (n) {
00579     if (!destroy_handle(handle, &error, errmsg)) {
00580       cb->error(error, errmsg);
00581       return;
00582     }
00583   }
00584 
00585   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00586     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00587   }
00588 }

00591 
00595 void
00596 Master::attr_set(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00597                  const char *name, const void *value, size_t value_len) {
00598   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00599   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00600   int error;
00601 
00602   if (m_verbose) {
00603     HT_INFOF("attrset(session=%lld, handle=%lld, name=%s, value_len=%d)",
00604              session_id, handle, name, value_len);
00605   }
00606 
00607   DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
00608 
00609   try {
00610     if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00611       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00612 
00613     if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00614       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00615 
00616     {
00617       boost::mutex::scoped_lock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00618 
00619       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name, value, value_len);
00620 
00621       HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET, name));
00622       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00623     }
00624 
00625     txn->commit(0);
00626   }
00627   catch (Exception &e) {
00628     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00629     txn->abort();
00630     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00631     return;
00632   }
00633 
00634   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK)
00635     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00636 }

00638 
00642 void
00643 Master::attr_get(ResponseCallbackAttrGet *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00644                  uint64_t handle, const char *name) {
00645   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00646   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00647   int error;
00648   DynamicBuffer dbuf;
00649 
00650   if (m_verbose)
00651     HT_INFOF("attrget(session=%lld, handle=%lld, name=%s)",
00652              session_id, handle, name);
00653 
00654   DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
00655 
00656   try {
00657     if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00658       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00659 
00660     if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00661       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00662 
00663     {
00664       boost::mutex::scoped_lock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00665       if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name, dbuf))
00666         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND, name);
00667     }
00668 
00669     txn->commit(0);
00670   }
00671   catch (Exception &e) {
00672     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00673     txn->abort();
00674     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00675     return;
00676   }
00677 
00678   StaticBuffer buffer(dbuf);
00679 
00680   if ((error = cb->response(buffer)) != Error::OK)
00681     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00682 }
00683 
00684 
00685 
00686 void Master::attr_del(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle, const char *name) {
00687   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00688   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00689   int error;
00690 
00691   if (m_verbose)
00692     HT_INFOF("attrdel(session=%lld, handle=%lld, name=%s)",
00693              session_id, handle, name);
00694 
00695   DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
00696 
00697   try {
00698     if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00699       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00700 
00701     if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00702       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00703 
00704     {
00705       boost::mutex::scoped_lock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00706 
00707       m_bdb_fs->del_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name);
00708 
00709       HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL, name));
00710       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00711     }
00712 
00713     txn->commit(0);
00714   }
00715   catch (Exception &e) {
00716     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00717     txn->abort();
00718     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00719     return;
00720   }
00721 
00722   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK)
00723     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00724 }

00726 
00727 void
00728 Master::exists(ResponseCallbackExists *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00729                const char *name) {
00730   int error;
00731   bool file_exists;
00732 
00733   if (m_verbose)
00734     HT_INFOF("exists(session_id=%lld, name=%s)", session_id, name);
00735 
00736   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00737 
00738   DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
00739 
00740   try {
00741     file_exists = m_bdb_fs->exists(txn, name);
00742     txn->commit(0);
00743   }
00744   catch (Exception &e) {
00745     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00746     txn->abort();
00747     cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00748     return;
00749   }
00750 
00751   if ((error = cb->response(file_exists)) != Error::OK)
00752     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00753 }

00757 Master::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, uint64_t session_id,

00770   try {
00771     if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00772       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);

00775       HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);

00794 
00795 
00796 void
00797 Master::lock(ResponseCallbackLock *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00798              uint32_t mode, bool try_lock) {
00799   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00800   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00801   bool notify = true;
00802 
00803   if (m_verbose) {
00804     HT_INFOF("lock(session=%lld, handle=%lld, mode=0x%x, try_lock=%d)",
00805              session_id, handle, mode, try_lock);
00806   }
00807 
00808   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00809     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00810     return;
00811   }
00812 
00813   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
00814     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE,
00815               std::string("handle=") + handle);
00816     return;
00817   }
00818 
00819   if (!(handle_data->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK)) {
00820     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_MODE_RESTRICTION,
00821               "handle not open for locking");
00822     return;
00823   }
00824 
00825   if (!(handle_data->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_WRITE)) {
00826     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_MODE_RESTRICTION,
00827               "handle not open for writing");
00828     return;
00829   }
00830 
00831   {
00832     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00833     NodeData::LockRequestList &pending_lock_reqs =
00834         handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs;
00835 
00836     if (handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00837       if (try_lock)
00838         cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00839       else {
00840         pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00841         cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00842       }
00843       return;
00844     }
00845     else if (handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED) {
00846       if (mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00847         if (try_lock)
00848           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00849         else {
00850           pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00851           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00852         }
00853         return;
00854       }
00855 
00856       assert(mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED);
00857 
00858       if (!pending_lock_reqs.empty()) {
00859         if (try_lock)
00860           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00861         else {
00862           pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00863           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00864         }
00865         return;
00866       }
00867     }
00868 
00869     // at this point we're OK to acquire the lock
00870     if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED &&
00871         !handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00872       notify = false;
00873 
00874     handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00875 
00876     DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
00877     try {
00878       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, handle_data->node->name, "lock.generation",
00879                               handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00880       txn->commit(0);
00881     }
00882     catch (Exception &e) {
00883       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00884       txn->abort();
00885       cb->error(e.code(), e.what());
00886       return;
00887     }
00888 
00889     handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = mode;
00890     lock_handle(handle_data, mode);
00891 
00892     // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00893     if (notify) {
00894       HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventLockAcquired(mode));
00895       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event_ptr);
00896     }
00897 
00898     cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED, handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00899   }
00900 }
00901 
00905 void Master::lock_handle(HandleDataPtr &handle_data, uint32_t mode) {
00906   if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
00907     handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.insert(handle_data->id);
00908   else {
00909     assert(mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE);
00910     handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle = handle_data->id;
00911   }
00912   handle_data->locked = true;
00913 }
00914 
00918 void
00919 Master::lock_handle_with_notification(HandleDataPtr &handle_data,
00920                                       uint32_t mode, bool wait_for_notify) {
00921   lock_handle(handle_data, mode);
00922 
00923   // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00924   HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockGranted(mode,
00925                            handle_data->node->lock_generation));
00926   deliver_event_notification(handle_data, event, wait_for_notify);
00927 }
00928 
00929 
00930 
00934 void
00935 Master::release(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle) {
00936   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00937   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00938 
00939   if (m_verbose) {
00940     HT_INFOF("release(session=%lld, handle=%lld)", session_id, handle);
00941   }
00942 
00943   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00944     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00945     return;
00946   }
00947 
00948   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
00949     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE,
00950               std::string("handle=") + handle);
00951     return;
00952   }
00953 
00954   release_lock(handle_data);
00955 
00956   cb->response_ok();
00957 }
00958 
00959 
00960 void Master::release_lock(HandleDataPtr &handle_data, bool wait_for_notify) {
00961   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00962   vector<HandleDataPtr> next_lock_handles;
00963   int next_mode = 0;
00964 
00965   if (handle_data->locked) {
00966     if (handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle != 0) {
00967       assert(handle_data->id == handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle);
00968       handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle = 0;
00969     }
00970     else {
00971       unsigned int count = handle_data->node->
00972           shared_lock_handles.erase(handle_data->id);
00973       HT_EXPECT(count, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00974     }
00975     handle_data->locked = false;
00976   }
00977   else
00978     return;
00979 
00980   // deliver LOCK_RELEASED notifications if no more locks held on node
00981   if (handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.empty()) {
00982     HT_INFO("About to deliver lock released notifications");
00983     HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventLockReleased());
00984     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event_ptr, wait_for_notify);
00985     HT_INFO("Finished delivering lock released notifications");
00986   }
00987 
00988   handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = 0;
00989 
00990   if (!handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.empty()) {
00991     HandleDataPtr next_handle;
00992     const LockRequest &front_lock_req = handle_data->node->
00993         pending_lock_reqs.front();
00994     if (front_lock_req.mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00995       next_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00996       if (get_handle_data(front_lock_req.handle, next_handle))
00997         next_lock_handles.push_back(next_handle);
00998       handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.pop_front();
00999     }
01000     else {
01001       next_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
01002       do {
01003         const LockRequest &lockreq = handle_data->node->
01004             pending_lock_reqs.front();
01005         if (lockreq.mode != LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
01006           break;
01007         if (get_handle_data(lockreq.handle, next_handle))
01008           next_lock_handles.push_back(next_handle);
01009         handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.pop_front();
01010       } while (!handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.empty());
01011     }
01012 
01013     if (!next_lock_handles.empty()) {
01014       handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
01015 
01016       DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
01017       try {
01018         m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, handle_data->node->name, "lock.generation",
01019                                 handle_data->node->lock_generation);
01020         txn->commit(0);
01021       }
01022       catch (Exception &e) {
01023         txn->abort();
01024         HT_FATAL_OUT <<"Problem writing attribute 'lock.generation' on file '"
01025             << handle_data->node->name <<"': "<< e << HT_END;
01026       }
01027 
01028       handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = next_mode;
01029 
01030       for (size_t i=0; i<next_lock_handles.size(); i++) {
01031         assert(handle_data->id != next_lock_handles[i]->id);
01032         lock_handle_with_notification(next_lock_handles[i], next_mode,
01033                                       wait_for_notify);
01034       }
01035 
01036       // deliver notification to handles to this same node
01037       HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockAcquired(next_mode));
01038       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event, wait_for_notify);
01039     }
01040   }
01041 }
01042 
01043 
01047 void
01048 Master::deliver_event_notifications(NodeData *node,
01049     HyperspaceEventPtr &event_ptr, bool wait_for_notify) {
01050   int notifications = 0;
01051 
01052   // log event
01053   for (HandleMap::iterator iter = node->handle_map.begin();
01054        iter != node->handle_map.end(); iter++) {
01055     //HT_INFOF("Delivering notification (%d == %d)", (*iter).second->event_mask, event_ptr->get_mask());
01056     if ((*iter).second->event_mask & event_ptr->get_mask()) {
01057       (*iter).second->session_data->add_notification(
01058           new Notification((*iter).first, event_ptr));
01059       m_keepalive_handler_ptr->deliver_event_notifications(
01060           (*iter).second->session_data->id);
01061       notifications++;
01062     }
01063   }
01064 
01065   if (wait_for_notify && notifications)
01066     event_ptr->wait_for_notifications();
01067 }
01068 
01069 
01073 void
01074 Master::deliver_event_notification(HandleDataPtr &handle_data,
01075     HyperspaceEventPtr &event_ptr, bool wait_for_notify) {
01076 
01077   // log event
01078   handle_data->session_data->add_notification(
01079       new Notification(handle_data->id, event_ptr));
01080   m_keepalive_handler_ptr->deliver_event_notifications(
01081       handle_data->session_data->id);
01082 
01083   if (wait_for_notify)
01084     event_ptr->wait_for_notifications();
01085 
01086 }
01087 
01088 
01089 
01093 bool
01094 Master::find_parent_node(const std::string &normal_name,
01095                          NodeDataPtr &parent_node, std::string &child_name) {
01096   NodeMap::iterator node_it;
01097   size_t last_slash = normal_name.rfind("/", normal_name.length());
01098 
01099   child_name.clear();
01100 
01101   if (last_slash > 0) {
01102     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_node_map_mutex);
01103     std::string parent_name(normal_name, 0, last_slash);
01104     child_name.append(normal_name, last_slash + 1,
01105                       normal_name.length() - last_slash - 1);
01106     node_it = m_node_map.find(parent_name);
01107 
01108     if (node_it != m_node_map.end())
01109       parent_node = (*node_it).second;
01110     else {
01111       parent_node = new NodeData();
01112       parent_node->name = parent_name;
01113       m_node_map[parent_name] = parent_node;
01114     }
01115     return true;
01116   }
01117   else if (last_slash == 0) {
01118     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_node_map_mutex);
01119     std::string parent_name = "/";
01120     node_it = m_node_map.find(parent_name);
01121     assert (node_it != m_node_map.end());
01122     child_name.append(normal_name, 1, normal_name.length() - 1);
01123     parent_node = (*node_it).second;
01124     return true;
01125   }
01126 
01127   return false;
01128 }
01129 
01130 
01134 bool
01135 Master::destroy_handle(uint64_t handle, int *errorp, std::string &errmsg,
01136                        bool wait_for_notify) {
01137   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
01138   unsigned int refcount = 0;
01139 
01140   if (!remove_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
01141     *errorp = Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE;
01142     errmsg = std::string("handle=") + handle;
01143     return false;
01144   }
01145 
01146   {
01147     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
01148 
01149     handle_data->node->remove_handle(handle_data->id);
01150     refcount = handle_data->node->reference_count();
01151   }
01152 
01153   release_lock(handle_data, wait_for_notify);
01154 
01155   if (refcount == 0) {
01156 
01157     if (handle_data->node->ephemeral) {
01158       std::string child_name;
01159       NodeDataPtr parent_node;
01160 
01161       if (find_parent_node(handle_data->node->name, parent_node, child_name)) {
01162         HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED,
01163                                                 child_name));
01164         deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event, wait_for_notify);
01165       }
01166 
01167       // remove file from database
01168       DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
01169 
01170       try {
01171         m_bdb_fs->unlink(txn, handle_data->node->name);
01172         txn->commit(0);
01173       }
01174       catch (DbException &e) {
01175         txn->abort();
01176         HT_FATALF("Unable to remove ephemeral file '%s' from database - %s",
01177                   handle_data->node->name.c_str(), e.what());
01178       }
01179 
01180       // remove node
01181       NodeMap::iterator node_it = m_node_map.find(handle_data->node->name);
01182 
01183       if (node_it != m_node_map.end())
01184         m_node_map.erase(node_it);
01185     }
01186   }
01187 
01188   return true;
01189 }
01190 
01191 
01194 void Master::get_generation_number() {
01195   DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction();
01196 
01197   try {
01198     if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr_i32(txn, "/hyperspace/metadata", "generation",
01199                                  &m_generation))
01200       m_generation = 0;
01201 
01202     m_generation++;
01203     m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i32(txn, "/hyperspace/metadata", "generation",
01204                             m_generation);
01205     txn->commit(0);
01206   }
01207   catch (DbException &e) {
01208     txn->abort();
01209     HT_FATALF("Error obtaining generation number: %s", e.what());
01210   }
01211 }
